name: Experimental Game Package
description:
Experimental Game 1 - Gone Fishing
2-D fantasy fishing game where you're situated on a boat fishing on an unknown planet. When prompted click and you'll reel in a random & strange seasonal alien fish.

Experimental Game 2 - Cat in Space
 2D omnidirectional scrolling game where you’re a cat floating in space, with aim to collect stars while avoiding comets. The player is able to click on the screen to move the player’s momentum towards a position. The player uses this to move the cat into stars collecting them. If the player collides with a comet however it’ll launch the player and change the direction of force (scroll direction).

Experimental Game 3 - Goblin Racing
2D racing game where you purchases, train and race goblins. The player is able to explore a selection of randomly generated goblins, selecting their own. Each goblin is unique! Will your goblin become the best racer?
